attributes.action: Protection of Religious places and innocent civilians in Iraq and Syria, Western governments stop funding terrorism
attributes.additional_details: We urge our government, to stop funding these terrorists who are causing atrocities and devastation, and take immediate action to restore stability not repeating mistakes. We don’t ask for a foreign intervene. We respect all religions and there should remain the freedom to practice. There needs to be protection provided for the sacred religious places and innocent civilians, not to forget the refugees.
